item.description:
How much time do you spend thinking about this & that, planning or worrying about the future, or just be "in your head" instead of in your experience? When you do this, what are you missing? What opportunities are lost?  What are you creating & not creating?

Eckhart Tolle's book "The Power of Now" has certainly jolted the world into an intense awareness of the Power of being in the present moment, the here and now.

Ann Ide, BostonLOA member & New Possibilities Life Coach, will facilitate our discussion in the following:
• What does it mean to be truly in the NOW?
• How do you take moments in the day, make them “delicious” & attract more of what you want?

Ann will also guide us through 2 powerful meditations to be fully in the NOW & ease into the flow of easier manifestation. One of the meditations is called “This Delicious Moment” & involves real food...hmmm You can bring some food you enjoy or select from what we'll have available.

Thank you, Ann, for your gift of love, time & availability for us.

****************************************************************
About Ann Ide: 
www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com

Ann is a certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming (NLP) & Hypnotherapy, & a certified NLP Life Coach with over 15 years experience. She has trained & consulted people nationally. Her passion is helping people move beyond suffering & mere survival, creating “New Possibilities” in their lives for greater harmony, happiness & success. She provides personal & group coaching, guided meditations, & business coaching workshops.
